thread.title: Trump Urges Congress to Take Action on Guns

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Trump Urges Congress to Take Action on Guns
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump urged Congress to take action on gun policy and school safety, arguing the deadly shooting at a Florida high school in February had pushed the gun violence debate into a “very different period.”
In a White House meeting with a bipartisan group of lawmakers, the president said, “We can’t wait and play games and nothing gets done.” He said gun violence “can be ended, and it will be ended.”

Mr.... RELATED VIDEO How Student Survivors Are Fueling a Gun-Control Movement In the wake of the school shooting in Parkland, Fla., that left 17 people dead, student survivors have started a movement for greater gun control. Two students from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School explain how social media, crowdfunding and political activism have helped spread their message. Photo: Getty Images
